text: Excellent conversation in the hallway track at #QConPlus; takeaways include "when we investigated our estate we found it wasn't just 25% zombies, it was 75% zombies" and "automating server shut-off out of hours doesn't work so well when our devs are in India, London, and SF."

author.description: @RedHat - Senior Principal Software Engineer, working on @QuarkusIO. Ex-IBM. Java Champion, developer, author, #cloud surfer and maker. My views are my own.
author.name: Holly Cummins (holly_cummins@hachyderm.io)
